author: TV Guide
title: Is the End in Sight? Fox Cuts Minority Report's Season to Only 10 Episodes
text: Is the End in Sight? Fox Cuts Minority Report's Season to Only 10 Episodes The precogs didn't see this coming. Fox has cut Minority Report's first season to 10 episodes, ... Comment   9:10 PM Updated at 11:50 PM   9:10 PM Updated at 11:50 PM Â» Social News The precogs didn't see this coming. Fox has cut Minority Report 's first season to 10 episodes, Variety reports. The drama was originally given a 13-episode order, but thanks to underwhelming ratings it could be ending its run earlier than expected. Minority Report premiered to just over 3 million total viewers, but has dropped in each week since its debut, most recently drawing in just barely over 2 million viewers. Did you love or hate Blindspot , Minority Report and Life in Pieces ? Unless the show's performance manages to dramatically improve over the course of its next seven episodes, the season finale could well be a series-ender. Sources say that viewers will get a satisfying finale, as the 10th episode was already planned as a fall finale-type episode. Have you been watching Minority Report ? Will you miss it if it doesn't return? Minority Report airs Mondays at 9/8c on Fox. Video: Megan Good is trying to make like Tom Cruise and do her own stunts for Minority Report By TV Guide
